abstract: Let's take a look at some of the unique features of the four games of the wild-card playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Each N.F.L. playoff game brings about its own sense of history, and the coming slate for this weekend is no different. Let's take a look at some of the unique features of the four games of the wild-card playoffs:
